# ADO.NET

> Documentation for ADO.NET.

## Subtopics

- [ADO.NET Extended Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/llms-extended.txt): 155 additional topics
- [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/llms.txt): 72 topics; DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews documentation and reference.
- [ADO.NET Entity Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/llms.txt): 42 topics, 174 in tree; ADO.NET Entity Framework documentation and reference.
- [SQL Server and ADO.NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/llms.txt): 48 topics, 205 in tree; SQL Server and ADO.NET documentation and reference.
